cast.overview: In 1950s New York, a department-store clerk who dreams of a better life falls for an older, married woman.
cast.title: Carol

cast.overview: A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969.
cast.title: First Man

details.biography:
Cory Michael Smith (born November 14, 1986) is an American actor and producer. He appeared in 2013 in Breakfast at Tiffany's on Broadway, which starred Emilia Clarke. Smith is most well-known for his role as The Riddler in the Fox series Gotham (2014–2019). He has appeared in several of Todd Haynes's films, including Carol(2015), Wonderstruck (2017), and May December (2023). Additional film roles include 1985 and First Man (both 2018), and Saturday Night (2024). The visual likeness of the character "Tanner" of the game Scrutinized is based on him.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Cory Michael Smith, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Cory Michael Smith
